'''Angakuk''' is or was the [[Wayob]] of an unknown tribe, mentioned in the [[Ancient Chronicle of the Dreamseeker Priest]] series of interactables.

==Profile==
The ''Ancient Chronicle of the Dreamseeker Priest (I)'' interactable refers to Angakuk as the "collective consciousness and guardian of the past."
